t:
It was the second day of hiking for us four friends when we came across a pond in the middle of the jungle.
A sign read that it could show the number of days left before we die.

As we looked into the water, 4 numbers appeared beneath our reflections:

   18529      ,      1       ,      1      ,     -1
c:
When will you die?



#pond #jungle #death #zombie #undead #future #prediction #twist





***SPOILER***

There's a undead guy in our group. All will die except one.
